mutants.code:
import string

def extract_unique_words(text):
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation))
    text = text.lower()
    words = set(text.split())
    return words

import string

def extract_unique_words(text):
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.punctuation))
    text = text.lower()
    words = set(text.split())
    return words
